name: Iron Key
description: An iron key crafted especially for the gates in the mines.

name: Red Roses Honey
description: Honey created from the pollen of red rose flowers, it's infused with healing properties.

name: Blue Roses Honey
description: Honey created from the pollen of blue rose flowers, it revitalizes the spirit and restores mana.

name: Daisy Honey
description: Honey created from the pollen of daisy flowers, it's infused with healing properties.

name: Orchid Honey
description: Honey created from the pollen of orchid flowers, it revitalizes the spirit and restores mana.

name: Flour
description: An important ingredient in bread, among lots of other culinary delights.

name: Noodles
description: Plain noodles, a staple for many dishes.

name: Greenspice
description: It might be a common spice, but it adds just the right zing to dishes.

name: Egg Tarts
description: Savory little egg bites, perfect as a snack.

name: Clam Chowder
description: A steaming hot bowl of clam chowder.

name: Red Veggie Soup
description: A delicious mix of savory and spice, perfect for warming up on cold days.

name: Creamy Beef Stew
description: A vegan variation of the popular meat and cream dish, it tastes almost like the real thing!

name: Spaghetti
description: Noodles in a sweetened tomato sauce, a staple in the Eastern Region.

name: Pot Pie
description: A hearty pie baked in a deep, heavy pot. It's a common farmer dish in the Western Region, but still very delicious.

name: Popcorn
description: Who knew boring old corn could make something that tastes so good?

name: Beginner's Apple Pie
description: Apples in a sweet syrup, baked inside a flakey pie crust.

name: Stuffed Casserole
description: A casserole stuffed to bursting with cheese and mushrooms.

name: Fried Rice
description: Rice fried up to crispy perfection, with an egg for good measure.

name: Blueberry Salad
description: A refreshing salad, most commonly enjoyed on sunny days.

name: Tomato Salad
description: A fresh tomato salad, complemented with crunchy lettuce and onion.

name: Pickled Veggie Salad
description: A pungent mixture of pickled vegetables.

name: Sesame Rice Ball
description: A recipe from a far away land, rice has never tasted better.

name: Strawberry
description: Notoriously difficult to grow, these yummy little fruits only flourish in the most fertile of soil.

name: Peach
description: Just peachy.

name: Raspberry
description: These juicy berries are deceptively tart.

name: Kettle Chips
description: Extra thick sliced potatoes, battered in sugar and deep fried. Super unhealthy and even more super delicious.

name: French Fries
description: Finely cut potatoes fried in oil until golden, crispy and ready to be showered in salt.

name: Tentacle Kebab
description: Pieces of juicy tentacles stuck on a skewer and then dunked in oil. A Withergate carnival staple.

name: Plain Pretzel
description: Mere bread dough boiled prior to being baked... how do they turn out so brown and delicious?

name: Corn Dog
description: A hotdog that has been breaded in cornmeal, stuck on a stick and fried in oil. Food this bad shouldn't taste so good.

name: Berry Glazed Pretzel
description: A crispy pretzel fresh from the oven and glazed with a sugary berry syrup.

name: Marshmallow Ghost
description: A marshmallow cut into the shape of a ghost. Simple, yet cute and fun.

name: Salted Pretzel
description: A pretzel slathered in fresh butter and then showered with chunks of sea salt.

name: Chocolate Pretzel
description: Someone absolute madman dunked this pretzel into melted chocolate. Was the world ready for this? Maybe not, but it's still delicious.

name: Caramel Apple
description: A sour green apple dipped into a generous amount of caramel sauce. The bitter of the apple compliments the sweetness of the caramel quite well.

name: Candy Apple
description: A sweet red apple absolutely coated with a thick sugar glaze. The sugar of the glaze really brings out of the sugar of the apple.

name: Overly Iced Cupcake
description: A pile of sugary pink frosting. We promise there's a cupcake in there somewhere!

name: Banana Peel Pie
description: The peel is really just there for presentation, you're meant to remove it before eating. Although if you're feeling especially adventurous...

name: Candy Kebab
description: Pieces of candy kebabed on a candy skewer, you're not sure how anyone got the notion to make something like this, but you're not going to question it. Get chomping!

name: Devil Donut
description: A devilishly delicious pastry that's been fried in oil and frosted in heavy icing. If eating this donut is wrong, trust us, you won't wanna be right.

name: Ice Cream Sandwich
description: A dollop of ice cream squished between two chocolate wafer cookies. No, you can't eat it for lunch "because it's a sandwich".

name: Moon Cream Pie
description: A delicate and airy puff pastry topped with a whipped orange crème. It's practically begging you to indulge in one... or two. Or three. Or eight.

name: Cotton Candy
description: The culinary Demons of Withergate have developed a method of spinning heated sugar in a bowl, cooling it into sweet strings. Light as cotton, yummy as candy. Ingenious.

name: Festive Oranges
description: Special oranges picked for the lantern festival.

name: Spicy Shrimp Ramen
description: Tiny shrimp fried in extra hot pepper sauce, ramen doesn't taste meaner than this.

name: Pork Ramen
description: Rice noodles are noodles made with rice, so it's sort of like two foods in one. Sort of.

name: Egg Ramen
description: Delicate egg noodles floating in a savory broth, topped with hard boiled eggs. Eggsactly what you need for the perfect bowl of ramen.

name: Moon Cake
description: A festive and delicious cake that is best shared with friends and family to truly celebrate the lantern festival.

name: Chow Mein
description: "Chow mein" translates to "Fried noodles", which is a very fitting named, considering this dish is made primarily of fried noodles!

name: Apple Cider
description: Ripe apples, pressed into a pulpy juice and spiced to cidery perfection.

name: Strawberry Milk
description: Milk... from a strawberry? Nah, just strawberry flavored cow milk!

name: Blueberry Muffin
description: A perfectly baked muffin dotted with juicy little blueberries.

name: Fruit Punch
description: A tropical drink that originated in the sunny Southern Islands, it's become a staple drink at parties and celebrations.

name: Raspberry Crepes
description: A crepe is like a fancy little pancake, filled with sweet raspberries it makes an extra yummy treat.

name: Fruit Tart
description: Aptly named, this pastry has a sharp tart kick in contrast to the sweet fruit and sugary crust.

name: Linguine with Clams
description: Thick sauce and noodles served with steamed clams, a great choice for a filling seafood meal.

name: Peaches and Cream
description: Sliced peaches served in a creamed milk sauce. This is sometimes used as the filling for a pie but it's just as good on its own.

name: California Roll
description: A type of sushi roll native to a far, far away and mythical land that is only spoken about in legends.

name: Fish Taco
description: A little different from what most people think of when it comes to "tacos", but still very delicious.

name: Creamy Mushroom Soup
description: In the past this simple soup was made due to a lack for any better ingredients. Today, however, it's an old fashioned comfort food classic.

name: Waffles
description: Light and airy on the inside, but golden and crunchy on the outside. All that's missing is a slab of butter and a bucket of syrup.

name: Nachos
description: If they're nacho chips, then who's are they? They're mine!

name: Lobster Roll
description: Seasoned lobster meat, served in a hotdog bun of all things. A bit strange, but it totally works.

name: Pad Thai
description: Stir-fried noodles and nuts, this is served as a popular street food in cities all over the four regions.

name: Lasagna
description: A classic dish from the Eastern Region, layers of sauce and noodles that make for a hearty dinner meal.

name: Potato Salad
description: A gooey mixture of potatoes and egg, it's not like any salad you've ever heard of before but it's pretty tasty.

name: Apple Sauce
description: A soft 'sauce' of mashed apples, easy to make and even easier to eat.

name: Veggie Kebab
description: Skewered veggies roasted over an open flame, the crisp taste of the fire adds a remarkably complex taste to the veggies.

name: Strawberry Shortcake
description: Some people enjoy letting the juice of the strawberry soak into the shortcake, while others try to eat it before that can happen.

name: Mochi Covered Strawberry
description: A strawberry, covered in a thin layer of flavored mochi. A lightweight but lovely dessert.

name: Acai Bowl
description: Sweet yogurt topped with an assortment of berries, a common breakfast food for many across the land.

name: Citrus Salad
description: Fragrant and slightly tangy, it's very invigorating for only being a 'mere' salad.

name: Fruit Snacks
description: Squishly little fruit snacks, an even more fun way to eat your fruits.

name: Tuna Nigiri
description: Raw fish can taste good? Who would have thought.

name: Tortilla Chips
description: A corn tortilla, cut up and turned into delicious crunchy chips thanks to the magic of deep frying.

name: Salsa
description: A loose sauce of tomato and spices, its zesty zing certainly dresses up all sorts of dishes.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Labor intensive to prepare, but the savory mushroom mixed with the twice-cooked rice is an excellent reward for the effort.

name: Mochi
description: Sweetened rice paste, shaped into a spongey cake and steamed before baking.

name: Corn Flour
description: Made of finely milled corn. It's heavier than wheat flour and slightly sweeter, too.

name: Hydrangea Cupcake
description: A cupcake topped with an intricately piped frosting design, world famous pastry chef Ramiro is credited for inventing this style of frosting.

name: Chicken Bastilla
description: Shredded chicken wrapped in layers of paper-thin dough. This delicious pastry was the signature dish of Raine, a world-famous chef and culinary visionary.

name: Dumplings
description: What's a lantern festival without dumplings? Let's hope we never have to find out.

name: Rice Ball Soup
description: The rice balls aren't actually made out of rice, but a dough made from rice flour. "Rice flour ball soup" just doesn't sound as nice, though.

name: Mining Essence
description: Ancient Nel'Varian mana, distilled into a consumable potion. This one contains the essence of earthen caverns and stone.

name: Fisherman's Essence
description: Ancient Nel'Varian mana, distilled into a consumable potion. This one contains the essence of rivers and streams.

name: Woodcutter's Essence
description: Ancient Nel'Varian mana, distilled into a consumable potion. This one contains the essence of deep forests and the trees.

name: Fortitude Essence
description: Distilled essence of ancient Nel'Varian mana, it bestows fortitude when tapped.

name: Mind Essence
description: Distilled essence of ancient Nel'Varian mana, it bestows mental stamina when tapped.

name: Arcane Essence
description: Distilled essence of ancient Nel'Varian mana, it bestows arcanic might when tapped.

name: Defense Essence
description: Distilled essence of ancient Nel'Varian mana, it bestows increased defenses when tapped.

name: Strength Essence
description: Distilled essence of ancient Nel'Varian mana, it bestows great strength when tapped.

name: Rock Candy Gem
description:
This is taking the idea of "rock candy" a bit too literally...

This candy gem can be used as a potion ingredient at the alchemy table.

name: Hard Butterscotch Gem
description:
This gemstone looks just like a yummy butterscotch candy. Hopefully it tastes like it, too.

This candy gem can be used as a potion ingredient at the alchemy table.

name: Jawbreaker Gem
description:
Think normal jawbreakers are hard? Try eating one made out of solid gemstone!

This candy gem can be used as a potion ingredient at the alchemy table.

name: Animal Feeder
description: Auto feed animals.

name: Small Money Bag
description: Jingles like music to your ears when you shake it.

name: Small Mana Tome
description: A passing wizard must have dropped this.

name: Large Mana Tome
description: Bursting with mana!

name: Orb
description: Contains an orb.

name: Ticket
description: A strange looking ticket.
